Vulnerability.Title: Verify User/Group Ownership on /etc/gshadow
Vulnerability.Description:
The /etc/gshadow file contains information about group accounts that is critical to the security of those accounts, such as the hashed password and other security information.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
